import React from "react"; import "./JobCard.css"; const JobCard = ({ job, onShare }) => { return (

{job.title}

{job.experience}
{job.tags.map((tag) => ( {tag} ))}
Login {" "} or{" "} sign up {" "} to know your profile Match %
{job.location}
{job.type}
); }; export default JobCard;
